name: Winkio
overview:
Winkio is a worldwide experiment whose goal is to get the world’s pulse: how people are feeling, what they are doing and what their concerns are. It’s using a social network and individuals to get the big picture! Share your pulse, react to the world’s news and know what’s up with your buddies and the world !”

Sharing. Users let the world know what’s up with them by sharing their pulse: how they are feeling, what they are doing and what they’re concerned about. Users can also react and express their feelings about the world’s news in the social news section.

Caring. Members can know what’s up with their buddies and get alerted when they are feeling bad or good.

Taking the world’s pulse. The international data aggregation allows to get the map and charts of the world’s pulse. Users can also discover what people all over the world think about the current news in the social news section.

We, at Winkio, are all committed to get the best of anything social on the web and try to give a sense to it.
